reviewText: I used to watch this show all the time and loved it.  It must have been because I was married to an abusive man at the time.  I am now blissfully single, and don't enjoy the show as much as I used to.  Oh well....I will keep them in case I ever need them again!  lol
I could watch this all day
The dvd was great. I love it. Simple as that.
Love this DVd ... not able to view on TV so I purchased the DVD... 2 Thumbs up... I still wish they would have a play all button....  But all in all... 5 stars
Great show interesting topic's with fascinating ways to solve the situations.. If nothing else it's interesting to see what kind of stupid ideas people come up with...
I love this series and love the dvd collection. Nice, quick and quality packaging. A must have for "Snapped" fans!
Good show - Informative and well written.  Necessary for any fan of "True Crime".  Now I need to buy the rest of the series!
I love snapped season 3 I would recommend getting this and the first two if you don't have them .
I love watching snapped on oxygen and since it's not on all the time it was great to be able too get the video and watch it anytime.
